Featured Games

Spirit of Uku: One Frog Can Make a Difference

By Patrick Knisely

Play or Learn More

A short meditation on climate change, planetary cycles, and the wonder that is existence on this planet, through the lens of a red-eyed tree frog’s life cycle.

About the Developer

Patrick Knisely is a game writer, game journalist and more. He co-hosts the podcast Super Switch Headz and streams as pdyx123 on Twitch.

Connect with the Developer

  • twitter
    https://twitter.com/Pdyx

Gender Dysphoria

By Exodrifter

Play or Learn More

A short 20 minute non-linear narrative game about negative experiences after coming out as transgender.

About the Developer

she/her ◈ vtuber indie game dev

Time Bandit

By Joel Jordon

Play or Learn More

Time Bandit is an idle adventure game where everything you do takes time. By coming back to the game periodically, you are invited to make as much or as little progress as you like, to make playing it a kind of habit or meaningful ritual, to welcome addictive gameplay loops or explore how to break them. It tells a story of how our time doesn’t belong to us — and how we can take it back.

About the Developer

They/She. Marxist. Game developer working on Time Bandit.

Connect with the Developer

  • twitter
    https://twitter.com/pumbertop/

Bible Study

By Elexus Pettigrew

Play or Learn More

In her Welcome to my Homepage projects, Elexus Pettigrew scratches at her relationship to Christianity and reflects on growing up as a closeted, Black, daughter of a preacher. When making the collage This Is America, she questioned if Black church is becoming more modern or returning to stereotypes of what Black congregants are supposed to be. For the video Bible Study, Pettigrew turned against her programming to not deface the bible, and instead followed a childhood urge to express herself on the pages.

About the Developer

Elexus Pettigrew is an African-American artist who uses video and photos to speak about our relationship with media consumption. Her main focus of work plays on being a product of your environment and how media consumption and programming make us who we are today. In her work, she uses stacked videos that show a representation of black stereotypes, and relationships we build through biased medias. In addition, a meditated communication of conversation can be followed along with each piece.

Connect with the Developer

  • instagram
    https://www.instagram.com/epthegoat/

Card Shark

By Nerial | Devolver Digital

Play or Learn More

Card Shark is an adventure game full of cunning, intrigue, and delectable deceit. Enter a world where you’ll need to play your opponents better than you play your cards.

About the Developer

NERIAL is an award- winning independent game studio based in the UK. We focus on digital stories / games for Mobile, PC and Console.

Connect with the Developer

  • twitter
    https://twitter.com/nerial
  • twitter
    https://twitter.com/devolverdigital

Games Y'all is a meetup presented by The Museum of Human Achievement. We endeavor to celebrate, amplify, and support the unique and underrepresented within indie games and beyond.
